description: This Dart source file defines the BabyNameProvider class, a ChangeNotifier that manages the state and filters for baby names in a Flutter app. It interacts with the BabyNameRepository to load names, apply filters such as gender, language, rashi, and starting character, and provides methods to update these filters and notify listeners of changes.

classes.name: BabyNameProvider
classes.description: A provider class managing the baby names data and filters, using ChangeNotifier for state updates.

methods.name: loadNames
methods.description: Loads all baby names from the repository and applies current filters.

methods.name: _applyFilters
methods.description: Applies current filter settings to update the filtered baby names list.

methods.name: updateSearchQuery
methods.description: Updates the search query and refilters the names.

methods.name: updateGenderFilter
methods.description: Sets the gender filter and updates the filtered list.

methods.name: updateLanguageFilter
methods.description: Sets the language filter, resets starting character, and refilters.

methods.name: updateRashiFilter
methods.description: Sets the rashi filter and updates the filtered list.

methods.name: updateStartingCharacterFilter
methods.description: Filters names by starting character and updates the list.

methods.name: clearFilters
methods.description: Resets all filters and reloads the complete names list.

methods.name: getStartingCharacters
methods.description: Retrieves the list of starting characters for the selected language.
